name: btop++
summary: Resource monitor that shows usage and stats for processor, memory, disks, network and processes
description: btop is a modern and colorful command line resource monitor that shows usage and stats for processor, memory, disks, network and processes. btop features: - Easy to use, with a game inspired menu system. - Full mouse support, all buttons with a highlighted key is clickable and mouse scroll works in process list and menu boxes. - Fast and responsive UI with UP, DOWN keys process selection. - Function for showing detailed stats for selected process. - Ability to filter processes. - Easy switching between sorting options. - Tree view of processes. - Send any signal to selected process. - UI menu for changing all config file options. - Auto scaling graph for network usage. - Shows IO activity and speeds for disks - Battery meter - Selectable symbols for the graphs - Custom presets - And more... btop is written in C++ and is continuation of bashtop and bpytop.
